input.sentences: the groom cut the cake at a beautiful wedding reception .
then he told the bride a terrible secret .
the bride got ready to toss her bouquet .
all the bridesmaids and the flower girls try to catch it .
output.sentences: Getting to photograph Julia's wedding was great!
We had to do three takes of them eating the cake.
The groom and his little brother were looking very handsome.
Julia was over the moon, when it was time to throw the bouquet.
Looks like one of these lovely ladies will be next!
